attributes.action: Make assaults on Elderly people result in Mandatory Custodial sentences
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Is'nt it about time we got tough on these lunatic lenient court sentences that are being dished out by these " liberal " judges in the UK. Please read the article below and sign this petition. These are the " KEY " issues that the Labour Party seem not to have noticed.

A man who punched a 96-year-old war veteran, leaving him blind in one eye, during an unprovoked attack on a tram in south London, escaped jail on Monday.

Stephen Gordon, 44, a paranoid schizophrenic, was sentenced to a three-year supervision order at Croydon Crown Court after the judge ruled that treatment rather than jail would be "in the best interests of the public in the future".
